oneOf.description: Project ID or file/record ID for resources.
oneOf.markdownDescription:
**Resource ID**  
Can be a project ID (e.g., `project-xxx`), container ID (e.g., `container-xxx`), file ID (e.g., `file-xxx`), or record ID (e.g., `record-xxx`).

items.description: File or record ID for a resource.
items.markdownDescription:
**Resource File/Record ID**  
File ID (e.g., `file-xxx`) or record ID (e.g., `record-xxx`).
